newsitem.title: USA: Indonesia Telkom at 30-5/8 in New York.
newsitem.headline: Indonesia Telkom at 30-5/8 in New York.

text.p: PT Telekomunikasi Indonesia (Telkom) closed at 30-5/8 in New York on Thursday. It recorded the day's low of 30-5/8 and the day's high of 30-3/4.
Volume was 32,900 American Depository Shares. Block volume was 12,400.
It previous close on Wednesday was 30-3/4. One ADS represents 20 ordinary shares. -- Jakarta newsroom (Tel: 6221-3846364).
